response.overview: A sexy mysterious thriller set in the Caribbean amongst the dangerous world of Brujas, sorcery and mind-altering drugs. Raven's Eye is a tale of revenge. When Dominic Salazar is introduced to Raven's Eye, a mind-controlling substance made from a flower, he uses it to get even with his family. But instead of him becoming the killer, he controls their minds and leads them to their own demise. When his girlfriend, Cierce discovers his secret, she fears for her life. But she only has herself to blame because she introduced him to the Bruja and the Raven's Eye. Now she is the only one who can end it.
response.title: Raven’s Eye
